nodes.text: Sharima was a Pantoran female who was a member of Saw Gerrera's partisans. In 0 ABY, shortly after the Battle of Yavin, Sharima attempted to defect from the partisans along with the Sullustan Bokk Naarg, claiming to have information on where the remaining partisans were getting information from. Sharima's attempt to defect was thwarted when three other partisans carried out a suicide bombing on Tellik Four Station, which resulted in Sharima's death.
